import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Web3 from 'web3'; import tether from '../tether.png' const Main = (props) => { console.log(props); const [amount,setAmount] = useState("0"); const handleSubmit = async(event)=>{ event.preventDefault(); console.log(amount); let amountValue = window.web3.utils.toWei(event.target.deposit.value.toString(),"ether"); console.log(amountValue); await setAmount(amountValue); console.log(amount); await props.stakeTokens(amount); } return (
Staking Balance Staking Balance
{window.web3.utils.fromWei(props.stakingBalance.stakingBalanceAvailable,"ether")} USDT {window.web3.utils.fromWei(props.rwdBalance.rwdBalance,"ether")} RWD
Balance: {window.web3.utils.fromWei(props.tetherBalance.tetherBalance,"ether")}
{"\u00A0"}{"\u00A0"}{"\u00A0"}USDT
AirDrop
) } export default Main
